page.title: 15The Police Station
page.content: The Police Station is on{London Road} beside the petrol station. It was modernised in 1975 and has a notice board just outside it showing how you can keep your house protected from robbers. Inside the Police Station there are three{cells:}one for women and two for men. Inside the cells have a toilet, a bed and three blankets. The door in the corridor is safely locked so if a prisoner gets out of a cell he has to get past the door aswell. There are{six policemen}altogether. Five of them are on patrol: two in a car and three walking around the streets. One is on duty in the Police Station. The Police have{three cars altogether. The policemen do not carry any{guns with them unless it is an emergency.
